thread.section_title: Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay in Hutong area
thread.title_full: Great Stay in Hutong area - Review of Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: M S
title: Great Stay in Hutong area
text:
Located in the hutongs area, this small hotel has chinese decorated rooms sharing two small courtyards, in a typical hutong's building.
Room is not so big, but very comfortable, with Good shower and bathroom, heating and AC.
Service and breakfast are also excellent.
